name: Paleface Swiss
description: '''Paleface Swiss''' is a Swiss [[beatdown hardcore]] band formed in 2017 in [[ZÃ¼rich]]. The band's lineup currently consists of vocalist Marc "Zelli" Zellweger, guitarist Yannick Lehmann, bassist Tommy Lee and drummer Cassiano "Cassi" Toma. The band have released three studio albums with their latest being ''[[Cursed (Paleface Swiss album)|Cursed]],'' released on 3 January 2025 through [[Blood Blast Distribution]]. It marked a continuation of their recent rise in prominence.
